snippet: Justice Sonia Sotomayor is giving the government until Friday morning to respond to her decision on President Obama’s health care law.
abstract: Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor temporarily blocks the Obama administration from forcing some religious-affiliated groups to provide health insurance coverage of birth control or face penalties as part of the Affordable Care Act; acting at the request of an order of nuns in Colorado, Justice Sotomayor issues the stay just hours before the requirement was to go into effect.

byline.original: By STEVE KENNY and ROBERT PEAR

lead_paragraph: Justice Sonia Sotomayor is giving the government until Friday morning to respond to her decision on President Obama’s health care law.

headline.main: Justice Blocks Contraception Mandate on Insurance in Suit by Nuns
headline.print_headline: Justice Blocks Contraception Mandate on Insurance in Suit by Nuns

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
